name: Christmas Morning (Lethian)
description:
Christmas Morning

Nobody wants to miss that!

I made this game as gift for @remco by participating in Secret Santa Jam #2021. It's about an Elf who's late for his own Christmas Morning, help him to solve some trivial puzzles to enjoy the Christmas with his family.

I wish you a Merry Christmas @remco, and I a happy new year!

There's no menu or controls screen unfortunately, but hey, I made a small intro though! But here's the controls for anyone who's skipped the monologue:

Controls:
Hold Left-Right Arrow Keys - Walk around
Hold Down Arrow Key - Jump off the platforms
Press Up Arrow Key - Jump and Double Jump
Press X Key - Interact with objects, skip dialogue
Press Z Key - Supplement Jump key for convenience

Credits:
TBA.
